about.subtitle: A Royal Experience!
about.description1: Royal Palace Hotel Tabriz is a four-star luxury hotel that opened in Tabriz in 1401. This hotel is built on 8 floors and has 47 rooms. Royal Palace Hotel Tabriz is located in a convenient location and has easy access to the commercial, recreational and historical centers of Tabriz.
about.description2: The rooms of Royal Palace Tabriz Hotel have complete amenities such as TV, refrigerator, mini bar, private bathroom, free internet, etc. The hotel also has recreational and sports facilities such as sauna, jacuzzi, gym, etc

rooms.subtitle: Luxury Accommodations
rooms.description: Choose from our carefully designed rooms and suites, each offering unique comfort and style.

standard.title: Standard Room
standard.description: The layout and type of rooms at Royal Palace are standard. All rooms have 24-hour room service and services are provided around the clock. Pets are not allowed in the rooms.

suit.title: VIP Suit
suit.description: The size and type of VIP suites at Royal Palace are larger than standard rooms. All suites have 24-hour room service and services are provided around the clock. Pets are not allowed in the suites.
